   20: 
   21: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   22: %%%
   23: %%% Define to run outside of test server
   24: %%%
   25: %%% -define(STANDALONE,1).
   26: %%%
   27: %%%
   28: %%% Define for debug output
   29: %%%
   30: %%% -define(debug,1).
   31: 
   32: -module(trace_meta_SUITE).
   33: 
   34: %% Exported end user tests
   35: -export([basic_test/0, return_test/0, on_and_off_test/0, stack_grow_test/0,
   36: 	 info_test/0, tracer_test/0, combo_test/0, nosilent_test/0]).
   37: 
   38: %% Internal exports
   39: -export([exported/1, exported_wrap/1, loop/4, id/1, receiver/1]).
   40: 
   41: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   42: %% Test server related stuff
   43: %%
   44: 
   45: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   46: -define(config(A,B),config(A,B)).
   47: -export([config/2]).
   48: -else.
   49: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   50: -endif.
   51:  
   52: -ifdef(debug).
   53: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   54: -define(line, erlang:display({?MODULE,?LINE}), ).
   55: -endif.
   56: -define(dbgformat(A,B),io:format(A,B)).
   57: -else.
   58: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   59: -define(line, noop, ).
   60: -endif.
   61: -define(dbgformat(A,B),noop).
   62: -endif.
   63:  
   64: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   65: config(priv_dir,_) ->
   66:     ".".
   67: -else.
   68: %% When run in test server.
   69: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   70:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   71: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   72: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   73: -export([basic/1, return/1, on_and_off/1, stack_grow/1, 
   74: 	 info/1, tracer/1, combo/1, nosilent/1]).
   75: 
   76: -define(erlang_trace, trace_sessions:erlang_trace).
   77: -define(erlang_trace_pattern, trace_sessions:erlang_trace_pattern).
   78: -define(erlang_trace_info, trace_sessions:erlang_trace_info).
   79: 
   80: 
   81: suite() ->
   82:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   83:      {timetrap, {minutes, 5}}].
   84: 
   85: all() ->
   86:     trace_sessions:all().
   87: 
   88: groups() ->
   89:     trace_sessions:groups(testcases()).
   90: 
   91: testcases() ->
   92:     [basic, return, on_and_off, stack_grow, info, tracer,
   93:      combo, nosilent].
   94: 
   95: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   96:     trace_sessions:init_per_suite(Config).
   97: 
   98: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   99:     trace_sessions:end_per_suite(Config).
  100: 
  101: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  102:     trace_sessions:init_per_group(Group, Config).
  103: 
  104: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  105:     trace_sessions:end_per_group(Group, Config).
  106: 
  107: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  108:     trace_sessions:init_per_testcase(Config).
  109: 
  110: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  111:     shutdown(),
  112:     trace_sessions:end_per_testcase(Config).
  113: 
  114: 
  115: %% Tests basic meta trace
  116: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  117:     basic_test().
  118: 
  119: %% Tests return trace
  120: return(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  121:     return_test().
  122:  
  123: %% Tests turning trace parameters on and off
  124: on_and_off(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  125:     on_and_off_test().
  126:  
  127: %% Tests the stack growth during return traces
  128: stack_grow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  129:     stack_grow_test().
  130:  
  131: %% Tests the trace_info BIF
  132: info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  133:     info_test().
  134:  
  135: %% Tests stopping and changing tracer process
  136: tracer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  137:     tracer_test().
  138: 
  139: %% Tests combining local call trace with meta trace
  140: combo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  141:     combo_test().
  142: 
  143: %% Tests that meta trace is not silenced by the silent process flag
  144: nosilent(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  145:     nosilent_test().
  146: 
  147: -endif.
  148: 
  149: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  150: %% Result examination macros
  151: 
  152: -define(CT(P,MFA),{trace,P,call,MFA}).
  153: -define(CTT(P, MFA),{trace_ts,P,call,MFA,{_,_,_}}).
  154: -define(RF(P,MFA,V),{trace,P,return_from,MFA,V}).
  155: -define(RFT(P,MFA,V),{trace_ts,P,return_from,MFA,V,{_,_,_}}).
  156: -define(RT(P,MFA),{trace,P,return_to,MFA}).
  157: -define(RTT(P,MFA),{trace_ts,P,return_to,MFA,{_,_,_}}).
  158: -define(NM, receive_no_next(100)).
  159: 
  160: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  161: %%% The Tests
  162: %%%
  163: 
  164: basic_test() ->
  165:     Pid = setup(),
  166:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[meta]),
  167:     [1,1,1,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  168:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  169:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  170:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  171:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local2,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  172:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local_tail,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  173:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},false,[meta]),
  174:     [1,1,1,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  175:     ?NM,
  176:     [1,1,1,0] = lambda_slave(fun() ->
  177:                                      exported_wrap(1)
  178:                              end),
  179:     ?NM,
  180:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[meta]),
  181:     [1,1,1,0] = lambda_slave(fun() ->
  182:                                      exported_wrap(1)
  183:                              end),
  184:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,_,_}) = receive_next(), %% The fun
  185:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  186:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  187:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  188:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local2,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  189:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local_tail,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  190:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},false,[meta]),
  191:     shutdown(),
  192:     ?NM,
  193:     ok.
  194: 
  195: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  196: 
  197: return_test() ->
  198:     Pid = setup(),
  199:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  200: 			 [meta]),
  201:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,'_'},[{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  202: 			 [meta]),
  203:     [1,1,1,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  204:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  205:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  206:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  207:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local2,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  208:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local_tail,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  209:     ?CTT(Pid,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]}) = receive_next(),
  210:     ?RFT(Pid,{erlang,phash2,2},0) = receive_next(),
  211:     ?RFT(Pid,{?MODULE,local_tail,1},[1,0]) = receive_next(),
  212:     ?RFT(Pid,{?MODULE,local2,1},[1,0]) = receive_next(),
  213:     ?RFT(Pid,{?MODULE,local,1},[1,1,0]) = receive_next(),
  214:     ?RFT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported,1},[1,1,1,0]) = receive_next(),
  215:     ?RFT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},[1,1,1,0]) = receive_next(),
  216:     shutdown(),
  217:     ?NM,
  218:     ok.
  219: 
  220: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  221: 
  222: on_and_off_test() ->
  223:     Pid = setup(),
  224:     1 = ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,local_tail,1},[],[meta]),
  225:     LocalTail = fun() ->
  226:                         local_tail(1)
  227:                 end,
  228:     [1,0] = lambda_slave(LocalTail),
  229:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,local_tail,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  230:     0 = ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,local_tail,1},[],[global]),
  231:     [1,0] = lambda_slave(LocalTail),
  232:     ?NM,
  233:     1 = ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},[],[meta]),
  234:     [1,1,1,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  235:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  236:     1 = ?erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},[],[meta]),
  237:     [1,1,1,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  238:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]}) = receive_next(),
  239:     ?CTT(Pid,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]}) = receive_next(),
  240:     shutdown(),
  241:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[meta]),
  242:     N = ?erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},true,[meta]),
  243:     case ?erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},false,[meta]) of
  244:         N -> ok;
  245:         Else ->
  246:             exit({number_mismatch, {expected, N}, {got, Else}})
  247:     end,
  248:     case ?erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},false,[meta]) of
  249:         N -> ok;
  250:         Else2 ->
  251:             exit({number_mismatch, {expected, N}, {got, Else2}})
  252:     end,
  253:     %% ?NM,
  254:     %% Can't check for erlang:*/* stuff since common_test or test_server
  255:     %% will likely call list_to_binary in the logger. just drain any potential
  256:     %% message
  257:     ok = flush(),
  258:     ok.
  259: 
  260: flush() ->
  261:     receive _ -> flush() after 0 -> ok end.
  262: 
  263: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  264: 
  265: stack_grow_test() ->    
  266:     Pid = setup(),
  267:     1 = ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,loop,4},
  268: 				   [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],[meta]),
  269:     Num = 1 bsl 15,
  270:     Surface =
  271: 	fun (This, ?RFT(P,{?MODULE,loop,4},N), N) when P == Pid->
  272: 		if N == Num ->
  273: 			?NM,
  274: 			ok;
  275: 		   true ->
  276: 			This(This, receive_next(), N+1)
  277: 		end
  278: 	end,
  279:     Dive =
  280: 	fun (This, ?CTT(P,{?MODULE,loop,[{hej,hopp},[a,b,c],4.5,N]}), N)
  281: 	    when P == Pid->
  282: 		if N == 0 ->
  283: 			Surface(Surface, receive_next(), 0);
  284: 		   true ->
  285: 			This(This, receive_next(), N-1)
  286: 		end
  287: 	end,
  288:     apply_slave(?MODULE,loop,[{hej,hopp},[a,b,c],4.5,Num]),
  289: %     apply_slave_async(?MODULE,loop,[{hej,hopp},[a,b,c],4.5,Num]),
  290: %     List = collect(test_server:seconds(5)),
  291:     ok = Dive(Dive, receive_next(), Num),
  292:     ?NM,
  293:     ok.
  294: 
  295: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  296: 
  297: info_test() ->
  298:     setup(),
  299:     Prog = [{['$1'],[{is_integer,'$1'}],[{message, false}]}, {'_',[],[]}],
  300:     Self = self(),
  301:     GoOn = make_ref(),
  302:     Pid =
  303: 	spawn_link(
  304: 	  fun () ->
  305: 		  ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},
  306:                                        Prog, [{meta, Self}]),
  307: 		  Self ! {self(), GoOn}
  308: 	  end),
  309:     receive {Pid, GoOn} -> ok end,
  310:     {traced,false} = ?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, traced),
  311:     {match_spec, false} =
  312: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, match_spec),
  313:     {meta, Self} = ?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, meta),
  314:     {meta_match_spec, MMS} =
  315: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, meta_match_spec),
  316:     case MMS of
  317:         Prog ->
  318:             ok;
  319:         Wrong ->
  320:             exit({bad_result, {erlang,trace_info,
  321:                                [{?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},
  322:                                 meta_match_spec]},
  323:                   {expected, Prog}, {got, Wrong}})
  324:     end,
  325:     erlang:garbage_collect(self()),
  326:     receive
  327:     after 1 ->
  328:               ok
  329:     end,
  330:     io:format("~p~n",[MMS]),
  331:     {meta_match_spec,MMS2} =
  332: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, meta_match_spec),
  333:     io:format("~p~n",[MMS2]),
  334:     case MMS2 of
  335:         Prog ->
  336:             ok;
  337:         Wrong2 ->
  338:             exit({bad_result, {erlang,trace_info,
  339:                                [{?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},
  340:                                 meta_match_spec]},
  341:                   {expected, Prog}, {got, Wrong2}})
  342:     end,
  343:     {all, [_|_]=L} = ?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, all),
  344:     {value, {meta, Self}} = lists:keysearch(meta, 1, L),
  345:     {value, {meta_match_spec, MMS}} = lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, L),
  346: 
  347:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, true, [meta]),
  348:     {meta_match_spec, []} =
  349: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, meta_match_spec),
  350: 
  351:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, false, [meta]),
  352:     {meta, false} = ?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, meta),
  353:     {meta_match_spec, false} =
  354: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, meta_match_spec),
  355:     {all, false} = ?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, all),
  356:     shutdown(),
  357:     ?NM,
  358:     ok.
  359: 
  360: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  361: 
  362: tracer_test() ->
  363:     Slave = setup(),
  364:     Self = self(),
  365: 
  366:     MatchSpec = [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  367:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(3, Self) end),
  368:     Setter = spawn_link(
  369:                fun () ->
  370:                        ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,receiver,1},
  371:                                             MatchSpec,
  372:                                             [{meta,Tracer1}]),
  373:                        ?erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},
  374:                                             MatchSpec,
  375:                                             [{meta,Tracer1}]),
  376:                        Self ! {self(), done}
  377:                end),
  378:     receive {Setter, done} -> ok end,
  379:     Ref = make_ref(),
  380:     apply_slave_async(?MODULE, receiver, [Ref]),
  381:     {Tracer1,?CTT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,[Ref]})} = receive_next(100),
  382:     {Tracer1,?CTT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]})} = receive_next(100),
  383:     {Tracer1,?RFT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,2},0)} = receive_next(100),
  384:     %% Initiate a return_trace that will fail since the tracer just stopped
  385:     Slave ! Ref,
  386:     receive_no_next(100),
  387:     %% The breakpoint has not been hit since the tracer stopped
  388:     {meta,Tracer1} =
  389: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta),
  390:     {meta_match_spec, MatchSpec} =
  391: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta_match_spec),
  392:     {meta,Tracer1} =
  393: 	?erlang_trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta),
  394:     {meta_match_spec, MatchSpec} =
  395: 	?erlang_trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta_match_spec),
  396:     %% Initiate trace messages that will fail
  397:     Ref2 = make_ref(),
  398:     apply_slave_async(?MODULE, receiver, [Ref2]),
  399:     Slave ! Ref2,
  400:     receive_no_next(100),
  401:     {meta,[]} =
  402: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta),
  403:     {meta_match_spec, MatchSpec} = 
  404: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta_match_spec),
  405:     {meta,[]} =
  406: 	?erlang_trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta),
  407:     {meta_match_spec, MatchSpec} =
  408: 	?erlang_trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta_match_spec),
  409:     %% Change tracer
  410:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(4, Self) end),
  411:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,receiver,1},
  412:                          MatchSpec,
  413:                          [{meta,Tracer2}]),
  414:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},
  415:                          MatchSpec,
  416:                          [{meta,Tracer2}]),
  417:     Ref3 = make_ref(),
  418:     apply_slave_async(?MODULE, receiver, [Ref3]),
  419:     {Tracer2,?CTT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,[Ref3]})} = receive_next(),
  420:     {Tracer2,?CTT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]})} = receive_next(),
  421:     {Tracer2,?RFT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,2},0)} = receive_next(),
  422:     %% Change tracer between call trace and return trace
  423:     Tracer3 = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(4, Self) end),
  424:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,receiver,1},
  425:                          MatchSpec,
  426:                          [{meta,Tracer3}]),
  427:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},
  428:                          MatchSpec,
  429:                          [{meta,Tracer3}]),
  430:     Slave ! Ref3,
  431:     %% The return trace should still come from Tracer2
  432:     {Tracer2,?RFT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1},Ref3)} = receive_next(),
  433:     Ref4 = make_ref(),
  434:     %% Now should Tracer3 be used
  435:     apply_slave_async(?MODULE, receiver, [Ref4]),
  436:     Slave ! Ref4,
  437:     {Tracer3,?CTT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,[Ref4]})} = receive_next(),
  438:     {Tracer3,?CTT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]})} = receive_next(),
  439:     {Tracer3,?RFT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,2},0)} = receive_next(),
  440:     {Tracer3,?RFT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1},Ref4)} = receive_next(),
  441:     %% The breakpoint has not been hit since the tracer stopped
  442:     {meta,Tracer3} = ?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta),
  443:     {meta_match_spec, MatchSpec} =
  444: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta_match_spec),
  445:     {meta,Tracer3} =
  446: 	?erlang_trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta),
  447:     {meta_match_spec, MatchSpec} =
  448: 	?erlang_trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta_match_spec),
  449:     shutdown(),
  450:     ?NM,
  451:     ok.
  452: 
  453: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  454: 
  455: combo_test() ->
  456:     Slave = setup(),
  457:     Self = self(),
  458: 
  459:     MatchSpec = [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  460:     Flags = lists:sort([call, return_to]),
  461:     LocalTracer = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(6, Self) end),
  462:     MetaTracer = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(4, Self) end),
  463:     1 = ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,receiver,1},
  464:                              MatchSpec,
  465:                              [local,{meta,MetaTracer}]),
  466:     1 = ?erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},
  467:                              MatchSpec,
  468:                              [local,{meta,MetaTracer}]),
  469:     1 = ?erlang_trace(Slave, true,
  470:                      [{tracer,LocalTracer} | Flags]),
  471:     %%
  472:     {all, TraceInfo1} =
  473: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, all),
  474:     {meta,MetaTracer} =
  475: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta),
  476:     {value,{meta,MetaTracer}} =
  477: 	lists:keysearch(meta, 1, TraceInfo1),
  478:     {meta_match_spec,MatchSpec} =
  479: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, meta_match_spec),
  480:     {value,{meta_match_spec,MatchSpec}} =
  481: 	lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, TraceInfo1),
  482:     {traced,local} =
  483: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, traced),
  484:     {value,{traced,local}} =
  485: 	lists:keysearch(traced, 1, TraceInfo1),
  486:     {match_spec,MatchSpec} =
  487: 	?erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,receiver,1}, match_spec),
  488:     {value,{match_spec,MatchSpec}} =
  489: 	lists:keysearch(match_spec, 1, TraceInfo1),
  490:     %%
  491:     {all, TraceInfo2} =
  492: 	?erlang_trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, all),
  493:     {meta,MetaTracer} =
  494: 	?erlang_trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta),
  495:     {value,{meta,MetaTracer}} =
  496: 	lists:keysearch(meta, 1, TraceInfo2),
  497:     {meta_match_spec,MatchSpec} =
  498: 	?erlang_trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, meta_match_spec),
  499:     {value,{meta_match_spec,MatchSpec}} =
  500: 	lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, TraceInfo2),
  501:     {traced,local} =
  502: 	?erlang_trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, traced),
  503:     {value,{traced,local}} =
  504: 	lists:keysearch(traced, 1, TraceInfo2),
  505:     {match_spec,MatchSpec} =
  506: 	?erlang_trace_info({erlang,phash2,2}, match_spec),
  507:     {value,{match_spec,MatchSpec}} =
  508: 	lists:keysearch(match_spec, 1, TraceInfo2),
  509:     %%
  510:     {flags,Flags1} = ?erlang_trace_info(Slave, flags),
  511:     Flags = lists:sort(Flags1),
  512:     {tracer,LocalTracer} = ?erlang_trace_info(Slave, tracer),
  513:     %%
  514:     Ref = make_ref(),
  515:     apply_slave_async(?MODULE, receiver, [Ref]),
  516:     Slave ! Ref,
  517:     ?CTT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,[Ref]}) = receive_next_bytag(MetaTracer),
  518:     ?CTT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]}) = receive_next_bytag(MetaTracer),
  519:     ?RFT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,2},0) = receive_next_bytag(MetaTracer),
  520:     ?RFT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1},Ref) = receive_next_bytag(MetaTracer),
  521:     ?CT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,[Ref]}) = receive_next_bytag(LocalTracer),
  522:     ?CT(Slave,{erlang,phash2,[1,1]}) = receive_next_bytag(LocalTracer),
  523:     case {receive_next_bytag(LocalTracer),
  524: 		receive_next_bytag(LocalTracer)} of
  525: 	      {?RF(Slave,{erlang,phash2,2},0),
  526: 	       ?RT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1})} ->
  527: 		  ok;
  528: 	      {?RT(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1}),
  529: 	       ?RF(Slave,{erlang,phash2,2},0)} ->
  530: 		ok;
  531: 	      Error1 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Error1})
  532: 	end,
  533:     case {receive_next_bytag(LocalTracer),
  534: 		receive_next_bytag(LocalTracer)} of
  535: 	      {?RF(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1},Ref),
  536: 	       ?RT(Slave,{?MODULE,slave,1})} ->
  537: 		  ok;
  538: 	      {?RT(Slave,{?MODULE,slave,1}),
  539: 	       ?RF(Slave,{?MODULE,receiver,1},Ref)} ->
  540: 		  ok;
  541: 	      Error2 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Error2})
  542: 	  end,
  543:     shutdown(),
  544:     ?NM,
  545:     ok.
  546: 
  547: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  548: %% Use case for Inviso meta tracing:
  549: %% Setup silent local call tracing, and start it using meta trace.
  550: 
  551: nosilent_test() ->
  552:     Pid = setup(),
  553:     Trigger = {?MODULE,id,1},
  554:     TriggerMS = [{[start],[],[{silent,false}]},
  555:                  {[stop],[],[{silent,true},{return_trace}]}],
  556:     1 = ?erlang_trace(Pid, true, [call,silent,return_to]),
  557:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[local]),
  558:     1 = ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,local2,1},
  559:                              [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  560:                              [local]),
  561:     1 = ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,1},false,[local]),
  562:     1 = ?erlang_trace_pattern(Trigger,false,[local]),
  563:     1 = ?erlang_trace_pattern(Trigger,TriggerMS,[meta]),
  564:     [1,1,1,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  565:     receive_no_next(17),
  566:     start = apply_slave(?MODULE, id, [start]),
  567:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,id,[start]})       = receive_next(),
  568:     [2,2,2,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[2]),
  569:     ?CT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported_wrap,[2]}) = receive_next(),
  570:     ?CT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported,[2]})      = receive_next(),
  571:     ?CT(Pid,{?MODULE,local,[2]})         = receive_next(),
  572:     ?CT(Pid,{?MODULE,local2,[2]})        = receive_next(),
  573:     ?CT(Pid,{?MODULE,local_tail,[2]})    = receive_next(),
  574:     ?RF(Pid,{?MODULE,local2,1}, [2,0])   = receive_next(),
  575:     ?RT(Pid,{?MODULE,local,1})           = receive_next(),
  576:     ?RT(Pid,{?MODULE,exported,1})        = receive_next(),
  577:     ?RT(Pid,{?MODULE,slave,1})           = receive_next(),
  578:     stop = apply_slave(?MODULE, id, [stop]),
  579:     ?CTT(Pid,{?MODULE,id,[stop]})        = receive_next(),
  580:     ?RFT(Pid,{?MODULE,id,1}, stop)       = receive_next(),
  581:     [3,3,3,0] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[3]),
  582:     receive_no_next(17),
  583:     shutdown(),
  584:     ok.
  585: 
  586: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  587: %% Trace target functions
  588: 
  589: loop(D1,D2,D3,0) ->
  590:     io:format("~p~n",[[D1,D2,D3]]),
  591:     0;
  592: loop(D1,D2,D3,N) ->
  593:     max(N,loop(D1,D2,D3,N-1)).
  594: 
  595: id(X) ->
  596:     X.
  597: 
  598: 
  599: exported_wrap(Val) ->
  600:     exported(Val).
  601: 
  602: exported(Val) ->
  603:     [Val | local(Val)]. %% Non tail recursive local call
  604: 
  605: local(Val) ->
  606:     [Val | local2(Val)]. %% Non tail recursive local call
  607: 
  608: local2(Val) ->
  609:     local_tail(Val). %% Tail recursive call
  610: 
  611: local_tail(Val) ->
  612:     [Val , erlang:phash2(1,1)]. 
  613: 
  614: 
  615: 
  616: receiver(Msg) ->
  617:     erlang:phash2(1,1),
  618:     receive Msg -> Msg end.
  619: 	    
  620: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  621: %% Trace target process and utilities
  622: 
  623: slave(Sync) ->
  624:     Sync ! sync,
  625:     receive
  626: 	{From,apply, M, F, A} ->
  627: 	    ?dbgformat("Apply: ~p:~p/~p (~p)~n",[M,F,length(A),A]),
  628: 	    Res = apply(M,F,A),
  629: 	    ?dbgformat("done Apply: ~p:~p/~p (~p)~n",[M,F,length(A),A]),
  630: 	    From ! {apply, Res},
  631: 	    ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,1},false,[meta]),
  632: 	    slave(From);
  633: 	{From, lambda, Fun} ->
  634: 	    Res = Fun(),
  635: 	    From ! {lambda, Res},
  636: 	    ?erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,1},false,[meta]),
  637: 	    slave(From);
  638: 	die ->
  639: 	    exit(normal)
  640:     end.
  641: 
  642: setup() ->
  643:     trace_off(),
  644:     Self = self(),
  645:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> slave(Self) end),
  646:     receive sync -> ok end,
  647:     put(slave,Pid),
  648:     Pid.
  649: 
  650: shutdown() ->
  651:     trace_off(),
  652:     Pid = get(slave),
  653:     case (catch is_process_alive(Pid)) of
  654: 	true ->
  655: 	    Ref = erlang:monitor(process,Pid),
  656: 	    Pid ! die,
  657: 	    receive
  658: 		{'DOWN',Ref,process,Pid,_} ->
  659: 		    ok
  660: 	    end;
  661: 	_ ->
  662: 	    ok
  663:     end.
  664: 
  665: trace_off() ->
  666:     ?erlang_trace(all, false, [all]),
  667:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[]),
  668:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[local]),
  669:     ?erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[meta]),
  670:     ?erlang_trace_pattern(on_load,false,[]),
  671:     ?erlang_trace_pattern(on_load,false,[local]),
  672:     ?erlang_trace_pattern(on_load,false,[meta]),
  673:     ok.
  674: 
  675: apply_slave_async(M,F,A) ->
  676:     Slave = get(slave),
  677:     Pid = 
  678: 	spawn(
  679: 	  fun () ->
  680: 		  Slave ! {self(),apply, M, F, A},
  681: 		  receive
  682: 		      {apply, _} ->
  683: 			  receive
  684: 			      sync ->
  685: 				  ok
  686: 			  end
  687: 		  end
  688: 	  end),
  689:     Pid.
  690: 
  691: apply_slave(M,F,A) ->
  692:     Pid = get(slave),
  693:     Pid ! {self(),apply, M, F, A},
  694:     receive
  695: 	{apply, Res} ->
  696: 	    receive
  697: 		sync ->
  698: 		    Res
  699: 	    end
  700:     end.
  701: 
  702: lambda_slave(Fun) ->
  703:     Pid = get(slave),
  704:     Pid ! {self(), lambda, Fun},
  705:     receive
  706: 	{lambda, Res} ->
  707: 	    receive
  708: 		sync ->
  709: 		    Res
  710: 	    end
  711:     end.
  712: 
  713: relay_n(0, _) ->
  714:     ok;
  715: relay_n(N, Dest) ->
  716:     receive Msg ->
  717: 	    Dest ! {self(), Msg},
  718: 	    relay_n(N-1, Dest)
  719:     end.
  720: 
  721: 
  722: receive_next() ->
  723:     receive_next(1000).
  724: 
  725: receive_next(TO) ->
  726:     receive
  727: 	M ->
  728: 	    M
  729:     after TO ->
  730: 	    ct:fail(timeout)
  731:     end.
  732: 
  733: receive_no_next(TO) ->
  734:     receive
  735: 	M ->
  736: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_message, M})
  737:     after
  738: 	TO ->
  739: 	    ok
  740:     end.
  741: 
  742: receive_next_bytag(Tag) ->
  743:     receive_next_bytag(Tag, infinity).
  744: receive_next_bytag(Tag, TO) ->
  745:     receive
  746: 	{Tag, Msg} ->
  747: 	    Msg
  748:     after
  749: 	TO ->
  750: 	    timeout
  751:     end.
